titleStmt.title: The house-holder: or, Perfect man. Preached in three sermons lately by Ed: Topsell, preacher at Saint Buttolphs without Aldersgate
titleStmt.author: Topsell, Edward, 1572-1625?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by W. Jaggard] for Henry Rockyt, and are to be sold at his shop in the Poultry, vnder the Diall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop in the Poultry, vnder the Diall
